DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Feasibility Wireless Electrocardiography
DOC.criteria: Patients must least 18 year age Patients must medical indication wear Holter monitor Patients must pregnant Patients must able comply study procedures Patients must willing participate able provide inform consent Patients must willing wear device ( Holter wireless device prototype ) simultaneously continuously 2 3 hr period Patients able willing comply study procedures Patients exist implanted cardioverterdefibrillator and/or pacemaker Patients known life threaten arrhythmia Patients manifest low voltage electrocardiogram Patients affect inflammatory and/or infectious skin disorder
